answers.answer_b: The core files can be downloaded back from Database.

answers.answer_b: The child theme is an extension of the parent theme

question: In which programming language WordPress is written?
What is moderate comment in WordPress.

answers.answer_a: Comments by admin on a post are not published directly unless the visitors provides it. It is called moderation.
answers.answer_b: Comments by admin on a post are not published directly unless the clients provides it. It is called moderation.
answers.answer_c: Comments by visitors on a post are not published directly unless the admin provides it. It is called moderation.

question: You have lost access to your admin area and can't recover it with email. What do you do?

answers.answer_c: Install a plugin to recover your password.
answers.answer_d: Add a new user with admin privileges in MySQL.
answers.answer_e: Reset the password of your user through MySQL.
answers.answer_f: Register a new user and set it as an administrator via your panel.

answers.answer_a: WordPress was co-founded by Allen Mullenweg and Luke Little on the 27th of June 2003.
answers.answer_b: WordPress was co-founded by Matt Mullenweg and Mike Little on the 27th of May 2003.
answers.answer_c: WordPress was co-founded by Andrew Mclean and Mike Hathaway on the 24th of May 2003.

answers.answer_a: WordPress is open source software you can use to create a beautiful website, blog, or app.
answers.answer_b: Wordpress is a social network just like Facebook and Twitter.
answers.answer_c: Wordpress is a HTML page builder you can use to create your static HTML pages.
